name: primekit
desc: Primekit — A modular developer toolkit for Flutter applications.

name: AccessPolicy
desc: Maps named features to the minimum MembershipTier required to access them.

name: AccessPolicy.new
desc: Creates an empty policy. Features must be defined before querying.

name: allDefinedFeatures
desc: Returns all explicitly defined feature names.

name: canAccess
desc:
Returns true if userTier meets or exceeds the required tier for
featureName.

name: clear
desc: Removes all defined features (useful in tests).

name: define
desc: Registers featureName as requiring at least requiredTier for access.

name: defineAll
desc: Registers multiple definitions at once.

name: featuresAvailableTo
desc:
Returns all feature names that tier can access given this policy,
including features that are open (undefined) would need to be known
externally — this method returns only explicitly defined features that
tier qualifies for.

name: featuresLockedFor
desc: Returns all feature names that tier cannot access.

name: isEmpty
desc: Whether the policy has no defined features.

name: length
desc: The number of features defined in this policy.

name: requiredTierFor
desc:
Returns the minimum MembershipTier required to access featureName,
or null if the feature is not in the policy (open access).

name: snapshot
desc: Returns a copy of the underlying policy map (immutable snapshot).

name: undefine
desc: Removes a previously defined feature from the policy.

name: ActivityFeed

desc: Creates an ActivityFeed backed by source.

name: loadPage

name: newItems
desc: Stream of new FeedItems arriving in real time.

name: pageSize
desc: Number of items returned per page.

name: publishItem

name: ActivityFeedSource
desc: Abstract backend for fetching and publishing activity feed items.

name: fetchPage
desc: Fetches a page of raw feed item maps, ordered by timestamp descending.

name: publish
desc: Publishes a raw feed item map to the backend.

name: watchNewItems
desc: Returns a stream that emits raw maps for new items as they arrive.

name: isDeleted
desc: Whether this document has been soft-deleted.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: syncedBy
desc: Device ID of the client that last wrote this document.

name: toJson
desc: Serialises to a JSON-encodable map.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: updatedAt
desc: UTC timestamp of the most recent mutation.

name: version
desc: Monotonically increasing version counter.

name: SyncOperation
desc: The type of write operation applied to a document.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: SyncRepository
desc:
Generic offline-first repository that transparently persists data locally
and synchronises with a remote SyncDataSource.

name: SyncRepository.new
desc: Creates a SyncRepository.

name: create
desc:
Creates a new document from data and queues a SyncOperation.create
change.

name: delete
desc:
Soft-deletes the document with id and queues a SyncOperation.delete
change.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: fullSync
desc: Clears the local cache and re-fetches all documents from the remote.

name: getAll
desc: Returns all non-deleted documents from the local cache.

name: getById
desc:
Returns the document with id from the local cache, or null if not
found or soft-deleted.

name: pendingChanges
desc: All pending SyncChange objects waiting to be pushed.

name: pendingChangesCount
desc: The number of local changes not yet pushed to the remote backend.

name: syncNow
desc:
Triggers a sync cycle: pushes pending local changes, then pulls remote
changes since the last sync timestamp.

name: syncState
desc: The sync state manager, exposing SyncState and change notifications.

name: update
desc:
Merges data into the document with id and queues a
SyncOperation.update change.

name: watchAll
desc:
A broadcast stream that emits the current list of non-deleted documents
every time local state changes.

name: SyncState
desc: Immutable snapshot of the sync engine's state at a point in time.

name: SyncState.new
desc: Creates an immutable SyncState.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy with the given fields overridden.

name: error
desc:
The error from the most recent failed sync cycle, or null when the
status is not SyncStatus.error.

name: hasError
desc: Returns true when the last sync attempt failed.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: isIdle
desc: Returns true when the repository is idle and fully synced.

name: isSyncing
desc: Returns true while a sync cycle is actively running.

name: lastSyncedAt
desc:
UTC timestamp of the last completed (successful) sync, or null if the
repository has never been synced.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: pendingChanges
desc: Number of local writes that have not yet been pushed to the remote.

name: progress
desc: Fractional progress (0.0 – 1.0) during a batch sync operation.

name: status
desc: The current sync phase.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: SyncStateManager
desc: Manages SyncState transitions and broadcasts changes to listeners.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: markSyncComplete
desc: Convenience: record a successful sync completion.

name: markSyncError
desc: Convenience: record a sync failure.

name: state
desc: The most recent sync state snapshot.

name: stateStream
desc: A broadcast stream that emits a new SyncState on every transition.

name: transition
desc: Transitions to newState, notifying all listeners.

name: transitionStatus
desc: Convenience: transition only the SyncStatus.

name: updatePendingChanges
desc: Convenience: update pending changes count without changing status.

name: updateProgress
desc: Convenience: update batch progress (0.0 – 1.0).

name: SyncStatus
desc: The current phase of the sync state machine.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: TabStateManager
desc: Manages per-tab scroll state for bottom-navigation-style layouts.

name: TabStateManager.new
desc: Creates a TabStateManager for tabCount tabs.

name: dispose
desc:
Disposes all ScrollControllers. Call this in the parent widget's
dispose() method.

name: getScrollController
desc: Returns the ScrollController associated with tabIndex.

name: getScrollPosition
desc:
Returns the last saved scroll position for tabIndex, or null if
the position has never been saved or was reset.

name: resetAll
desc: Resets scroll positions for every tab.

name: resetTab
desc:
Resets the scroll position for tabIndex and jumps the controller to
the top (offset 0) if it has attached clients.

name: saveScrollPosition
desc: Records position as the last known scroll offset for tabIndex.

name: tabCount
desc: The total number of tabs managed by this instance.

name: TaskConfig
desc: Configuration for scheduling a single background task execution.

name: TaskConfig.new
desc: Creates a task configuration.

name: constraints
desc: Execution constraints (network, charging, idle).

name: initialDelay
desc: Optional delay before the task first runs.

name: inputData
desc: Arbitrary key-value data passed to BackgroundTask.execute.

name: maxRetries
desc: Maximum number of retry attempts on failure. Platform-dependent when null.

name: taskId
desc: The BackgroundTask.taskId of the task to run.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TaskFailure
desc: Indicates a critical failure — the task should not be retried.

name: TaskFailure.new
desc: Creates a failure result wrapping the given error.

name: error
desc: The underlying error that caused the failure.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TaskRegistry
desc:
Global registry mapping BackgroundTask.taskId strings to factory
functions used by WorkManager's top-level dispatch callback.

name: clearForTesting
desc: Clears all registered factories. For use in tests only.

name: register
desc: Registers a factory for taskId.

name: registerBuiltIns
desc: Pre-registers all Primekit built-in tasks.

name: registeredIds
desc: Returns a snapshot of all registered task IDs. For use in tests only.

name: resolve
desc:
Resolves taskId to a new BackgroundTask instance, or returns null
if no factory has been registered for that identifier.

name: TaskResult
desc: Sealed result type for background task execution outcomes.

name: TaskResult.failure
desc: The task failed critically and should not be retried.

name: TaskResult.retry
desc: The task failed transiently and should be retried.

name: TaskResult.success
desc: The task completed successfully.

name: TaskRetry
desc: Indicates a transient failure — the scheduler may retry the task.

name: TaskRetry.new
desc: Creates a retry result with an optional reason for logging.

name: reason
desc: Optional human-readable reason for the retry request.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TaskScheduler
desc: Unified background task scheduler built on WorkManager.

name: cancel
desc: Cancels the task registered under uniqueName.

name: cancelAll
desc: Cancels all registered background tasks.

name: initialize
desc: Initialises the WorkManager plugin and registers the dispatch callback.

name: instance
desc: The shared singleton instance.

name: isScheduled
desc: Returns true if a task with uniqueName is scheduled.

name: scheduleOnce
desc: Schedules a one-off task.

name: schedulePeriodic
desc: Schedules a periodic task.

name: TaskSuccess
desc: Indicates successful task completion.

name: TaskSuccess.new
desc: Creates a success result.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TierGate
desc:
A widget that renders child only when the current user's tier meets or
exceeds requires.

name: TierGate.new
desc: Creates a TierGate.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: child
desc: The widget to show when the user has sufficient access.

name: customCheck
desc: If supplied, replaces the default tier comparison.

name: fallback
desc: Widget shown when the user's tier is below requires.

name: requires
desc: The minimum tier required to show child.

name: TimeoutException
desc: Thrown when a request times out.

name: userMessage
desc: A safe, user-facing message (defaults to generic message).

name: ToastPosition
desc: Where the toast appears on screen.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: ToastService
desc: A service that displays typed, positioned SnackBar toasts.

name: error
desc: Shows an error toast.

name: info
desc: Shows an info toast.

name: show
desc: Displays a typed toast with full configuration.

name: success
desc: Shows a success toast.

name: warning
desc: Shows a warning toast.

name: ToastType
desc: The semantic type of a toast message, controlling its color and icon.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: TokenExpiredException
desc: Thrown when an auth token has expired.

name: userMessage
desc: A safe, user-facing message (defaults to generic message).

name: TokenRefreshCallback
desc:
A callback that receives the current refresh token and must return a fresh
access token on success, or null on failure.

name: TokenStore
desc: Secure, singleton storage for JWT access and refresh tokens.

name: clearAll
desc: Removes both the access and refresh tokens from secure storage.

name: getAccessToken
desc: Returns the stored access token, or null if none exists.

name: getRefreshToken
desc: Returns the stored refresh token, or null if none exists.

name: hasValidToken
desc: Returns true if a non-expired access token is stored.

name: instance
desc: The singleton instance.

name: saveAccessToken
desc: Persists token as the access token.

name: saveRefreshToken
desc: Persists token as the refresh token.

name: TokenStoreBase
desc: Abstract interface for token persistence.

name: TrialEvent
desc: Events emitted by TrialManager when a trial's lifecycle changes.

name: TrialEventEnded
desc: A trial has ended for productId.

name: productId
desc: The Primekit product ID whose trial ended.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TrialEventEndingSoon
desc: A trial is ending soon; hoursLeft indicates the time remaining.

name: hoursLeft
desc: Approximate hours remaining in the trial.

name: productId
desc: The Primekit product ID whose trial is ending.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TrialEventStarted
desc: A trial has just been started for productId.

name: productId
desc: The Primekit product ID for which the trial started.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: trialEnds
desc: UTC timestamp when the trial period ends.

name: TrialManager
desc: Manages free-trial periods for products locally on-device.

name: TrialManager.new
desc: Creates a TrialManager backed by preferences.

name: dispose
desc: Cancels the periodic expiry check and closes the event stream.

name: endTrial
desc:
Ends the trial for productId immediately by clearing stored dates and
emitting TrialEventEnded.

name: events
desc: Broadcast stream of TrialEvents for all managed trials.

name: eventsFor
desc: Returns a Stream scoped to events for a single productId.

name: getRemainingTime
desc:
Returns the remaining trial duration for productId, or null if no
active trial exists.

name: getTrialEndDate
desc:
Returns the UTC timestamp when the trial for productId ends, or null
if no trial has been started.

name: isInTrial
desc: Returns true if productId has an active, non-expired trial.

name: startTrial
desc: Starts a trial for productId lasting duration.

name: TrialStarted
desc: A free trial has started for a product.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: productId
desc: The Primekit product ID for which the trial started.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: trialEnds
desc: UTC timestamp when the trial period ends and billing begins.

name: UnauthorizedException
desc: Thrown when the user is not authorized to access a resource.

name: userMessage
desc: A safe, user-facing message (defaults to generic message).

name: UpgradePrompt
desc:
A standardised upgrade call-to-action widget that prompts the user to
upgrade to targetTier.

name: UpgradePrompt.new
desc: Creates an UpgradePrompt.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: customMessage
desc: Optional custom message overriding the default copy.

name: featureName
desc: Optional name of the feature that triggered this prompt.

name: onUpgradeTap
desc: Called when the user taps the upgrade CTA.

name: style
desc: Controls the visual layout of the prompt.

name: targetTier
desc: The tier the user needs to access the gated feature.

name: UpgradePromptStyle
desc: Controls the visual presentation style of an UpgradePrompt.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: UploadCancelledException
desc:
Thrown when the caller cancels an upload and then awaits
UploadTask.downloadUrl.

name: UploadCancelledException.new
desc: Creates an UploadCancelledException.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: UploadFailedException
desc: Thrown when an upload fails.

name: UploadFailedException.new
desc: Creates an UploadFailedException with a message.

name: message
desc: Developer-facing error message.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: UploadStatus
desc: The lifecycle state of an UploadTask.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: UploadTask
desc: Represents an in-flight or completed file upload.

name: UploadTask.fromController
desc: Creates an UploadTask backed by the provided UploadTaskController.

name: cancel
desc: Cancels the upload; downloadUrl will throw UploadCancelledException.

name: downloadUrl
desc: Resolves to the public download URL once UploadStatus.completed.

name: pause
desc: Pauses the upload (platform-dependent; no-op for HTTP uploads).

name: progress
desc: Upload progress from 0.0 (not started) to 1.0 (complete).

name: resume
desc: Resumes a paused upload.

name: status
desc: Stream of UploadStatus transitions.

name: taskId
desc: Unique identifier for this task (e.g. a UUID or remote path hash).

name: UploadTaskController
desc:
Mutable controller used by MediaUploader implementations to drive
an UploadTask.

name: UploadTaskController.new
desc: Creates a controller with taskId.

name: cancel
desc: Cancels the upload (implementor hook).

name: complete
desc: Marks the upload as complete and resolves UploadTask.downloadUrl.

name: fail
desc: Marks the upload as failed.

name: pause
desc: Pauses the upload (implementor hook).

name: resume
desc: Resumes the upload (implementor hook).

name: setProgress
desc: Emits a progress value in [0.0, 1.0].

name: setStatus
desc: Emits a new UploadStatus.

name: taskId
desc: The task identifier shared with the resulting UploadTask.

name: UserProfile
desc: An immutable value type representing a user's public profile.

name: UserProfile.fromJson
desc: Constructs a UserProfile from a JSON map (e.g. from Firestore).

name: UserProfile.new
desc: Creates a UserProfile.

name: avatarUrl
desc: Public avatar URL.

name: bio
desc: Optional bio / about text.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a new UserProfile with the given fields replaced.

name: createdAt
desc: When the profile was created.

name: displayName
desc: Display name shown in the UI.

name: email
desc: User's email address (may be null for privacy).

name: followerCount
desc: Number of users following this profile.

name: followingCount
desc: Number of users this profile is following.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: id
desc: Unique user identifier.

name: metadata
desc: Arbitrary extra fields (e.g. custom attributes from Firestore).

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this UserProfile to a JSON-serialisable map.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ValidationException
desc: Thrown when input validation fails.

name: errors
desc: Field-level validation errors. Key is field name, value is error message.

name: userMessage
desc: A safe, user-facing message (defaults to generic message).

name: ValidationResult
desc: The result of a schema validation operation.

name: ValidationResult.invalid
desc: Creates a failed validation result with errors keyed by field name.

name: ValidationResult.valid
desc: Creates a successful validation result with the coerced value.

name: errorFor
desc: Returns the error message for field, or null if there is none.

name: errors
desc: Field-level error messages. Empty when isValid is true.

name: firstError
desc: Returns the first error message across all fields, or null if valid.

name: hasError
desc: Returns true if field has at least one error.

name: isValid
desc: Whether all validation rules passed.

name: merge
desc: Merges another ValidationResult into this one.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: The validated (and possibly coerced) value.

name: VerificationMailer
desc: Sends OTP and verification-link emails with built-in HTML templates.

name: VerificationMailer.new
desc: Creates a verification mailer.

name: sendOtp
desc: Sends a one-time password email to toEmail.

name: sendVerificationLink
desc: Sends a magic-link / email-verification email to toEmail.

name: sendWelcome
desc: Sends a welcome email to toEmail for a newly registered userName.

name: VersionInfo
desc: Immutable snapshot of the application version metadata.

name: appName
desc: The human-readable application name.

name: buildNumber
desc: The platform build number (e.g. '45').

name: isNewerThan
desc: Returns true if this is a higher version than otherVersion.

name: isOlderThan
desc: Returns true if this is a lower version than otherVersion.

name: isSameAs
desc: Returns true if this is the same version as otherVersion.

name: packageName
desc: The fully-qualified package name (e.g. 'com.example.myapp').

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: version
desc: The marketing version string (e.g. '1.2.3').

name: callbackDispatcher
desc: Top-level callback registered with WorkManager.

name: Permission
desc: An immutable, namespaced permission token.

name: Permission.all
desc: Returns a wildcard permission for resource, e.g. 'posts:*'.

name: Permission.delete
desc: Returns a delete permission for resource, e.g. 'posts:delete'.

name: Permission.new
desc: Creates a Permission from a raw key string.

name: Permission.read
desc: Returns a read permission for resource, e.g. 'posts:read'.

name: Permission.write
desc: Returns a write permission for resource, e.g. 'posts:write'.

name: action
desc: The action segment, e.g. 'read' from 'posts:read'.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: isWildcard
desc: Whether this is a wildcard permission (action is '*').

name: key
desc: The raw permission key, e.g. 'posts:read'.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: resource
desc: The resource segment, e.g. 'posts' from 'posts:read'.
